pr_title: BAEL-3871: Added tests for duplicate HTTP controller methods

timeline.message: BAEL-3871: Added tests for duplicate HTTP controller methods with different response types.

timeline.bodyText:
Rename as *UnitTest or *IntegrationTest (whichever is appropriate)
This should fix the Jenkins build

replies.bodyText: I have added the "Unit" suffix in the following commit: 7458950e5697183446f28409260ae417f85fd859
